attributes.additional_details: Its time there was a watchdog over the DVLA. There is on every thing else eg; power, water, health, and more but nothing over the DVLA. Its time this stopped and a regulating body put in place.

rejection.details: The DVLA is part of the Civil Service, and is responsible to Department for Transport Ministers, who in turn are accountable to Parliament.  There is, therefore, a watchdog over the DVLA.  Indeed, the House of Commons Transport Select Committee will be questioning the chief executive of the DVLA later this month.
